title: Salmon, sweet citrus salad, remoulade and bread and butter crisps
description: Top-notch Loch Duart salmon was used in this recipe, the perfect fish to stand up against the powerful citrus flavours of the remoulade’s dressing.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half and seeds scrapped out
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz salmon fillet, skinned and cut into large bite-sized pieces (two pieces per portion)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ small celeriac, peeled and finely sliced
2 slices of white bread, crusts removed and toasted both sides
1 bag of mixed salad leaves or 2 lettuces washed and prepared
fennel tops or micro fennel tops
